moves.1... e5: i hoped for a king's gambit
moves.2. d4: well i guess ill settle for this.
moves.4. Qe3 Nf6 5. Bc4 Ne5 6. b3 Bd6 7. f4: these knights are about to have fun.
moves.8. Qd4 O-O: just in case he has any ideas
moves.9. e5: nice fork, but i got a better idea
moves.11. Qd3 Bf2+ 12. Kf1: i was surprised i thought he would go to d1
moves.13. Qf5 Qh4: all the pressure is here, i feel that he cannot attack me enough to scare me
moves.14... Nxg3+ 15. hxg3 Qxh1: i win the exchange and more
moves.16. Nc3: he did not even try to stop the check
moves.20. Bxd5 Bxf5+ 21. Kxf5 Nh6+: pushes the king back into his tomb
moves.22. Ke4 c6 23. Bc4 Qg2+: only one place to move to
moves.24. Kd3: probably should bring a rook into this but they can be blocked by the knight and or bishop.
